attributes.action:
Ban people from moaning about fireworks!!!!

Who is sick of people moaning
attributes.background: The people who just moan moan moan about everything and anything and spoiling what other people like please sign this if u sick of people twisting about fireworks the country is becoming a joke and not enjoying a good tradition and just moaning on social media enough is enough of these winers

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action.

If you would like to oppose the proposal to ban the sale of fireworks to the public you could sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/232242
